Localization.Name: Clark Defense Systems
Localization.Description:
Ground-combat defensive systems, covers a lot of commercial territory from personal armor to defense systems. Naming convention tend to be pretty straight-forward and logical.

Models: PAB-4 (Personal Ablative/Ballistic Light Armor)

QDB-12 QuiKCade (Quick Deployment Barricade)

English.Name: Clark Defense Systems
English.Description:
Ground-combat defensive systems, covers a lot of commercial territory from personal armor to defense systems. Naming convention tend to be pretty straight-forward and logical.

Models: PAB-4 (Personal Ablative/Ballistic Light Armor)

QDB-12 QuiKCade (Quick Deployment Barricade)

Localization.Name: ADP Legs White
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Heavy Armor
Damage Reduction: 40%
Temp. Rating: -75 / 105 °C
Radiation Protection: 52800 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 251.1 REM/s
Carrying Capacity: 8.0 µSCU

Revolutionary when first released, the ADP heavy armor system was heralded as the pinnacle of personal protection. Clark Defense Systems' maximalist design provides plenty of attachment points and excellent protection against the elements and enemy fire. CDS refined and reshaped the ADP line over the years, but many still consider the original ADP to be the touchstone of military-grade heavy armor.
